metaTags.metaDescription: The Cloudflare Developer Platform product offering has everything you need to deliver serverless applications.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Learn how to reduce, or even eliminate, egress fees with Cloudflare.

leftHalf.title: Developers who know use Cloudflare
leftHalf.copy:
__All the primitives you need to build full-stack and AI applications__

Pure creation and unhindered innovation. Stop worrying about infrastructure, performance, and unpredictable pricing: the Cloudflare developer platform offers scalable computing power, databases, storage, media, and AI to build applications.

primaryCta.elementName: Developer Platform (HP) - Hero Content - Primary button

relatedBlades.title: Build on scalable infrastructure in the connectivity cloud

columnContent.title: Improve user experience everywhere
columnContent.description: Get the lowest latency with greater control when code is automatically deployed to all 300 global locations.

columnContent.title: Boost productivity and innovation
columnContent.description: Build, deploy, and deliver trusted applications everywhere without operational overhead. Developers get a straight line from writing to deploying code.

columnContent.title: Transparent and competitive pricing
columnContent.description: Reduce costs with generous free tiers, transparent pricing, and no egress fees.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud Application Platforms.
columnContent.description: We believe this recognition is a testament to the Cloudflare Developer Platform's commitment to making serverless, AI, and edge computing primitives accessible to every developer to build and deploy fullstack applications to region: Earth.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named a 'Leader' in The Forrester New Wave for Edge Development Platforms for Q4 2023
columnContent.description: Forrester recognizes Cloudflare for offering "the building blocks enterprises need to create full stack distributed applications." This recognizes our vision and strategy of providing a complete compute platform to deliver production applications at scale.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named a 'Leader' in 2024 IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Commercial Edge Delivery Services
columnContent.description: IDC highlights Cloudflare for having a "keen focus on the developer ecosystem and a strategy to invest in new technologies". This recognition validates our approach to help businesses of any size with any-to-any connectivity to apps, users and networks in a simple and secure way.

imageAssetFile.altText: Analyst Recognition - IDC - Full Color Thumbnail

contentfulAsset.description: Analyst Recognition - IDC - Full Color Thumbnail

content.value: Run workloads on our infinitely scalable global network, with locations in more than %{DataCenterCount} cities. Deploy serverless code instantly across the globe to give your applications exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.
Code is deployed and executes globally, reducing network round trips for minimal latency
Deploy using popular frameworks with minimal configuration for a better developer experience
Run background or batch tasks allowing services to run at their own pace.
Expand your toolkit with Workers Integration Marketplace
See all products
From storing session state to objects and more, store data on the Cloudflare global network.
S3-compatible global object storage with no egress fees
Build natively serverless SQL databases, or make your existing databases feel distributed
Stateful edge applications with a consistent data store
Globally distributed key-value storage
See all products

Make websites blazing fast by optimizing content for performance and serving content from the Cloudflare global network, which is located within 50 ms of %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the Internet-connected population globally.
Upload, encode, record, play, and serve live and on-demand video content
Optimize and dynamically resize images
Build a highly scalable image pipeline
Deliver content to users from the closest available Cloudflare data center
See all products

cards.title: Build scalable full stack applications
cards.description: Use Cloudflare Workers to construct serverless applications that scale up and down with demand.

cards.title: Optimize web experience
cards.description: Enhance your applications with optimized images, video, and dynamic functions.

cards.title: Build AI applications
cards.description: Run generative AI tasks on our global network of GPUs.

cards.title: Improve application reliability
cards.description: Detect, diagnose, and resolve application issues with logging and analytics.

cards.title: Ingest, store, and query data
cards.description: A variety of options for storing, processing, and querying data and objects.

cards.title: Deliver, store, and optimize media
cards.description: Enable rapid, cost-effective downloads of digital assets stored as objects.

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
C&A goes serverless with Cloudflare to scale swiftly
when online shopping soars

content.value: As C&A mapped out its future, the team recognized that their infrastructure needed to be nimble to accommodate unpredictable digital crowds driven by Black Friday, irresistible marketing promotions, and social media influencers. During these times, traffic can increase up to 10 times in a very short time period.
Now, not only does Cloudflare Workers deliver a seamless customer experience, but it also allows C&A to manage fluctuations in site traffic without introducing excessive costs.

"Cloudflare aligns precisely with our ecommerce vision. With Cloudflare Workers, we eliminate the operational overhead of implementing and managing servers. That gives us more time to focus on the business."

features.title: Delivery Hero
features.description: Using Cloudflare as a single network entry point for its global operations, Delivery Hero reduced complexity, enhanced global network performance, and secured its international workforce and websites

features.title: Porsche Informatik
features.description: Porsche Informatik relies on Cloudflare to manage traffic for its brand and dealer network, protect its websites from the internet, and automate cloud migration tasks

features.title: Docker
features.description: With Cloudflare Cache Reserve, Docker ensures swift, reliable, and secure delivery of 500+ million downloads daily

features.title: Conrad Electronic
features.description: As online business becomes more important for Conrad Electronic, they use Cloudflare to streamline development, protect ecommerce websites against sophisticated bot attacks, and simplify user access

features.title: PhonePe
features.description: PhonePe protects over 33 million merchants and provides a frictionless and low-latency customer experience to over 400 million registered users, using Cloudflare.

features.title: C&A
features.description: C&A leverages Cloudflare's developer platform to handle 10x traffic increases during sales and holiday events

columnContent.description: Create full-stack applications that are instantly deployed to the Cloudflare global network.
